downloadTitle: Best Practices for Insider Risk and Communication Compliance in Exchange Online
downloadDescription: Presentation from the Microsoft Exchange Community (MEC) Technical Airlift - September 13-14, 2022

downloadFile.name: Best Practices for Insider Risk and Communication Compliance in Exchange Online.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/f/9/6/f96013e9-b7f4-4d02-a91b-bb81740b96ef/Best Practices for Insider Risk and Communication Compliance in Exchange Online.pdf

detailsSection:
Exchange is one of the most important communication tools in organizations worldwide. Moreover it´s the foundation for Microsoft 365 Groups, Microsoft Teams, and the most Compliance features. This session covers the how, what, and why of Insider Risk Management and Communication Compliance and Exchange. Come learn how to use these to tools to be more compliant.

Recording of presentation by Raphael Köllner is at https://youtu.be/d_4Y3wtVwps.
detailsSection_file_name: Best Practices for Insider Risk and Communication Compliance in Exchange Online.pdf
installInstructionSection: Open file with any PDF reader.
